metadataAttributes.Title: Survey Data Collection and Analytics  Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Collect and analyze data, and communicate results. Learn to collect quality data and conduct insightful data analysis in six courses.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Collection, Cluster Sampling, R Programming, Missing Data, Data Quality, Data Analysis, Data Generating Process,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Frauke Kreuter, Ph.D. ,Mariel Leonard ,Frederick Conrad, Ph.D. ,James M Lepkowski ,Richard Valliant, Ph.D. ,
